name: Steel Furnace
pages: The Steel furnace is 1.6x more faster than the vanilla furnace, below is the recipe for it. This furnace can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/iron_furnace)iron furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires an $(l:patchouli:items/iron_conductor_block)iron conductor block/$ in its recipe.
